summary:
**Prometheus (2012 Film)**

"Prometheus" is a sci-fi horror movie directed by Ridley Scott. It's part of the "Alien" series but tells a new story. In the late 21st century, the crew of the spaceship Prometheus follows a map found in ancient Earth cultures to find where humans came from. They land on a distant planet and face a danger that could wipe out humanity. The film stars Noomi Rapace and Michael Fassbender. It was made with a big budget and shot in many countries. "Prometheus" made a lot of money and led to a sequel called "Alien: Covenant."
title: Prometheus (2012 film)
